title: Response
description: JSON Schema for Response data structures

$schema.description: path to the JSON Schema to use for the validation of the data structure

draftId.description: unique identifier of the draft for which this response has been issued

responderId.description: unique identifier of the the user has received this draft and whose response is needed

agree.description: true if the draft has been accepted, false otherwise

response.description: a textual description of the response, used ONLY if agree is false
